name: dissatisfactory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something that is dissatisfactory is unsatisfactory, or makes you feel dissatisfied (= not pleased or satisfied with something): The committee found that the management of the budget had been wholly dissatisfactory. A biological definition here is somehow dissatisfactory.
More examplesFewer examplesThe most dissatisfactory situation for patients was that the doctors could not be reached by phone.In the case of a dissatisfactory experiment, the farmer may make adjustments and attempt the experiment again.For various reasons, this may be a dissatisfactory system.
